hero.title: Astrocartography Calculator - Discover Your Ideal Location
hero.description: Astrocartography Calculator maps your birth chart onto the world, revealing where planetary lines amplify your career, relationships, and personal growth. Using professional-grade calculations with Swiss Ephemeris accurate to 1 mile, we analyze locations worldwide to show where Sun, Venus, Jupiter, and other planetary energies are strongest. Digital nomads, relocators, and astrology enthusiasts trust our free tool for data-driven location insights—no sign-up, no limits.

introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is Astrocartography Calculator
introduce.label: Introduction
introduce.description: Astrocartography Calculator projects your birth chart globally, showing where planets were angular at your birth moment.

items.title: Professional-Grade Planetary Calculations
items.description: Astrocartography Calculator uses Swiss Ephemeris, the astronomical standard used by professional astrologers. We calculate where each planet (Sun, Moon, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn) was angular—rising (ASC), setting (DSC), culminating (MC), or at nadir (IC)—at your exact birth moment across Earth's surface. Each astrocartography line is accurate to within 1 mile, ensuring your astrocartography chart matches professional astrologer calculations. When you stand on a planetary line, that planet's energy dominates your experience there.

items.title: AI-Powered Location Interpretation
items.description: Our system analyzes how your birth chart interacts with locations worldwide. The AI explains what each astrocartography line means: Venus lines activate love and creativity, Jupiter lines bring opportunities and expansion, Saturn lines strengthen career discipline. We don't just show where lines are—we explain how to read astrocartography maps and what each location means for your career, relationships, health, and creativity, making astrocartography for relocation practical and accessible.

items.title: Instant Multi-Format Export
items.description: Generate your astrocartography map in 3 seconds, then download high-resolution PNG, PDF, or SVG files. Maps clearly mark all planetary lines, power spots (line intersections), and city names. Paired with AI interpretation reports, your astrocartography chart is ready for personal planning, professional consultations, or team relocation decisions. All files are watermark-free with full commercial rights.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: Why Choose Our Astrocartography Calculator
benefit.label: Core Benefits
benefit.description: Our astrocartography calculator combines astronomical precision with AI interpretation, offering professional-grade analysis that's completely free and privacy-focused.

items.title: Professional Precision, Completely Free
items.description: Professional-grade astrocartography analysis with unlimited free access. We use the same Swiss Ephemeris library that professional astrology software relies on, with 1-mile accuracy using Swiss Ephemeris calculations. Generate unlimited astrocartography charts, download watermark-free files, and access AI interpretations—no credit card, no hidden fees. Whether you're a student, entrepreneur, or retiree, access professional astrocartography analysis at zero cost.

items.title: Honest, Context-Aware Guidance
items.description: Unlike tools promising guaranteed outcomes, we acknowledge astrocartography shows energy potential, not certainties. A Venus line might enhance relationships or surface relationship challenges you need to address. Our AI considers your personal chart context, current life stage, and planetary interactions. FAQs honestly state: use astrocartography maps as one factor among practical considerations like career opportunities, cost of living, and visa requirements. Real astrology respects complexity—we do too.

items.title: Privacy-First Architecture
items.description: Your birth data calculates locally in your browser—never uploaded to servers, never stored in databases, never shared with third parties. Generate your astrocartography chart with complete privacy. All files have full commercial rights: use them for personal planning, professional consultations, teaching, or publishing without licensing fees. Privacy and professional quality shouldn't be exclusive to paying customers.

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Use Astrocartography Calculator
usage.description: Generate your professional astrocartography chart in 4 simple steps.

items.title: Enter Birth Information
items.description: Input your birth date, time (as precise as possible to the minute), and city. Without exact birth time, you'll still see planetary lines (Sun, Moon, Venus, etc.) but not angular lines (ASC, DSC, MC, IC). Our database includes cities worldwide with automatic timezone and historical daylight saving time handling.

items.title: Select Planetary Lines
items.description: Choose which planets to display: Sun (confidence, identity), Moon (emotions, security), Venus (love, aesthetics), Mars (action, competition), Jupiter (opportunities, growth), Saturn (discipline, career), plus Uranus, Neptune, and Pluto. The system renders astrocartography lines in real-time on the world map.

items.title: Explore Interactive Map & AI Insights
items.description: Click any planetary line or power spot (line intersection) for detailed AI interpretation. Learn how that planet affects your career, relationships, health, and creativity in that location, plus whether it suits long-term residence, short visits, work, or study. No query limits—explore as much as you need.

items.title: Export Professional Files
items.description: Download high-resolution PNG maps, PDF interpretation reports, or SVG vector files with one click. All files are watermark-free and support commercial use. Print for consultation meetings, share with friends, or use in team relocation decisions.

feature.name: feature
feature.title: Professional Astrocartography Calculator Features
feature.description: Six core features ensure both astronomical precision and practical usability.

items.title: Interactive Global Map
items.description: Drag, zoom, and click any city to instantly view its planetary energy distribution. Maps support satellite, terrain, and political boundary views, helping you understand how astrocartography lines correspond to real geography. Power spots (line intersections) are highlighted—these energy convergence zones are key focus points in astrocartography for relocation decisions.

items.title: Swiss Ephemeris Calculation Engine
items.description: We use Swiss Ephemeris, supporting planetary calculations from 3000 BCE to 3000 CE. Maintained by the Zurich Observatory, this library uses the same precision standards that professional astrology software worldwide relies on. Whether analyzing historical figures or planning future relocations, your astrocartography map accuracy matches professional astrology software.

items.title: Multi-Language Global Coverage
items.description: Search cities in Chinese, English, Japanese, and more across locations worldwide with historical timezone data. The system automatically handles daylight saving time changes (like US DST rule shifts 1970-2007) and timezone boundary adjustments, ensuring accurate astrocartography charts regardless of birth country or era.

items.title: Smart Planetary Line Filtering
items.description: Display or hide specific planetary line combinations without limits. Show only Sun+Jupiter lines for career cities, only Venus+Moon lines for emotional security locations, or hide Saturn+Pluto lines to avoid high-challenge zones. Save favorite filter configurations to quickly compare different planetary combinations and find locations matching your current life stage goals.

items.title: Power Spots Energy Analysis
items.description: AI automatically identifies and highlights line intersections (power spots) where multiple planetary energies activate simultaneously. These crossings typically exert stronger influence than single lines. For example: Venus+Jupiter intersections may bring romantic opportunities and wealth growth, while Saturn+Pluto intersections suit deep transformation and career rebuilding.

items.title: History & Multi-Person Comparison
items.description: The system auto-saves your generation history, supporting simultaneous loading of multiple astrocartography charts for comparison. Compare your planetary line overlaps with a partner's, identify Jupiter line intersections among team members, or compare transit chart changes across years. For team relocations, family moves, or partner site selection, quickly overlay multiple people's distributions.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Astrocartography Calculator FAQ - Common Questions Answered
faq.description: Real answers to questions our users actually ask.

items.title: What if I don't know my exact birth time?
items.description: You can still use Astrocartography Calculator! Without exact time, we can't show your ASC/DSC/MC/IC lines, but you'll still see planetary lines (Sun, Moon, Venus, etc.) which reveal plenty about location compatibility. For best results, check your birth certificate or contact the hospital where you were born.

items.title: I felt terrible living on my Venus line. Is the map wrong?
items.description: Astrocartography shows potential energies, not guarantees. A Venus line might enhance relationships but could also amplify relationship challenges you need to work through. Context matters—your personal chart, life circumstances, and other planetary influences all play a role. Our AI interpretation can help you understand these nuances.

items.title: How accurate are the calculations?
items.description: We use Swiss Ephemeris calculations with professional-grade accuracy, precise to within 1 mile on Earth's surface. Our calculations account for time zones, daylight saving time, and historical calendar changes. This is the same precision professional astrologers rely on for consultations.

items.title: Should I move based solely on my astrocartography map?
items.description: No. Astrocartography is a powerful tool for understanding location energies, but it shouldn't be your only consideration. Factor in practical matters like career opportunities, cost of living, visa requirements, and personal connections. Use our maps as one input among many for making life decisions.

items.title: Can I use the generated maps commercially?
items.description: Yes. Your generated astrocartography charts and interpretation reports can be used for any purpose: personal planning, professional astrology consultations, teaching, publications, social sharing, etc., without licensing fees. Your birth data calculates locally with complete privacy protection.

items.title: What is your refund policy?
items.description: We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee for the 2-Week Access Pass ($9.9) if you've used the service fewer than 3 times. Monthly subscriptions can be cancelled anytime, with a 7-day refund guarantee for first-time subscribers. For detailed refund terms, eligibility, and how to request a refund, please visit our Refund Policy page.

testimonial.name: testimonial
testimonial.label: Testimonials
testimonial.title: Real Users Share Their Astrocartography Experiences
testimonial.description: Users share how our astrocartography calculator informed their relocation decisions.

items.title: Sophia Chen
items.label: Digital Nomad
items.description: As a digital nomad, I used the astrocartography calculator to analyze 20+ candidate cities. I chose Lisbon where my Venus line passes, and after arriving, my social circle expanded rapidly—I even met my current partner. Astrocartography isn't magic, but it helped me understand why certain cities feel more comfortable.

items.title: Marcus Liu
items.label: Astrology Consultant
items.description: 60% of my client consultations involve relocation questions. The astrocartography calculator lets me quickly show clients their planetary line distributions, paired with relocation chart analysis. One client succeeded in starting a business in a Jupiter line city and referred 5 friends. This tool elevated my service professionalism.

items.title: Elena Rodriguez
items.label: Astrology Student
items.description: After studying astrocartography for 2 years and testing multiple paid tools, this calculator's Swiss Ephemeris results match my Solar Fire software exactly, but with a friendlier interface and clearer interpretations. Highly recommend for all astrology learners.

items.title: James Park
items.label: Entrepreneur
items.description: When planning to open a branch in Asia, I used the astrocartography calculator to analyze Singapore, Bangkok, and Tokyo. I chose Bangkok where my Sun and Jupiter lines converge, and development exceeded expectations. But I understand: astrocartography is just one reference factor—business environment and market research matter equally.

items.title: Amelia Wang
items.label: Mental Health Counselor
items.description: I integrate astrocartography maps into clients' career planning consultations. Many clients feel 'something's off' in certain cities but can't explain why—astrocartography provides an interpretive framework. Privacy protection is excellent; clients can generate maps themselves and bring them to discuss.

items.title: David Kim
items.label: Retirement Planner
items.description: Before retirement, I researched 10 candidate locations. The astrocartography calculator showed my Moon line passing through New Zealand's South Island. After site visits, I chose New Zealand and truly felt emotional peace and belonging. But I also valued healthcare resources and cost of living. Astrocartography maps are excellent starting points.
